Text.Name: SuperPart_Turtle_1
Text.Desc: A secret body passed down by the ancient turtle sage that remolds the shell with Force of Creed. Once achieved, it will be almost impossible to penetrate.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.\n Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a large amount.
